full_sentence: I'm white and I'm asked this frequently and I don't even care, probably because i do look mexican. You guys actually find this offensive? Get over yourselves, they're not comparing you to nigs or anything bad

topics.sentence_slice: they're not comparing you to nigs

full_sentence: We don't need any form of eugenics to prevent our race from degrading! So I don't agree with you. We are already taking care of our people. True that we have too many people to take care of and not enough people and resources to take care of them, but this is not a problem. The resources are better used on this than on other things like promoting sports or aggressive videogames. We don't have to force eugenics on people and we definitely shouldn't have a system of rewards to encourage people with good genes to procreate cause all people should be able to decide whether or not they want to procreate.

topics.sentence_slice: We don't need any form of eugenics
